references.paper_title: Conditional validity of inductive conformal predictors
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of conditional validity, a crucial aspect of conformal prediction addressed in the current work.

references.paper_title: The limits of distribution-free conditional predictive inference
references.reason: This paper establishes the theoretical limits of distribution-free conditional predictive inference, which is directly relevant to the challenges tackled in the current research.

references.paper_title: Distribution-free prediction bands for non-parametric regression
references.reason: This paper provides foundational work on distribution-free prediction bands for non-parametric regression, which sets the stage for the methods used in the present work.
This paper presents recent work on batch multivalid conformal prediction, which addresses some of the same challenges as the new method proposed here.
This paper develops conformal prediction methods with conditional guarantees, a key area of focus and improvement in the current work.
